Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of roughly incised Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394328) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394328)
